content.text: I'm a hippie. I drive a large, blue van. I love to recycle. I have two tattoos.

My hobbies include rock collecting and making macaroni art. I work at the gas station as a part time job. I once saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store. My life's goal is to be the world's foremost encyclopedia salesman. I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman.
Wow, you're really interesting! I've never met a traveling encyclopedia salesman before. What's that like?
It's a lot of fun! I get to meet all sorts of interesting people and learn about different cultures. I also get to see a lot of the country.
That sounds really cool! I'm jealous.
I'm glad you think so. It's definitely a great job.
So, what's the most interesting thing you've ever seen on your travels?
I've seen a lot of interesting things, but I think the most interesting thing was the time I saw Peyton Manning at the grocery store.
Wow, that's really cool! What was he doing there?
He was just buying groceries like everyone else. He was really nice and he even took a picture with me.
That's awesome! I'm so jealous!
I'm glad you think so. It was definitely a cool experience.
So, what's your life goal?
My life goal is to be the world's foremost encyclopedia salesman. I think it would be really cool to be able to help people learn about the world.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll achieve it.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to rock climb, go hiking, and play video games. I also love to travel.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not much of a rock climber, but I love to go hiking and play video games. I also love to travel.
That's awesome! We should go hiking together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll text you the details.
Great! See you then.
